gov.va.med.srcalc.web.controller

Class CalculationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.va.med.srcalc.web.controller.CalculationController

  • @Controller
public class CalculationController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for creating a new Calculation.

        @Inject

        Constructs an instance.

    • Method Detail

      • forceStartNewCalculation

        @RequestMapping(value="/newCalc",
                method=GET,
                params="force")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView forceStartNewCalculation(@RequestParam(value="patientDfn")
                                                                                   int patientDfn,
                                                                                   javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        Creates a brand new calculation with the specified dfn. Any existing calculation is lost.
        Parameters:
        patientDfn - the desired patient's dfn
        session - the current session

      • startNewCalculation

        @RequestMapping(value="/newCalc",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView startNewCalculation(@RequestParam(value="patientDfn")
                                                                              int patientDfn,
                                                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        Starts a new calculation if there was no previous calculation in the session. If there was a previous calculation, redirects in order to ask the user if they want to start a completely new calculation with the new patient DFN.
        Parameters:
        patientDfn - the new patient's dfn
        session - the current session

      • setSpecialty

        @RequestMapping(value="/selectSpecialty",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String setSpecialty(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                           @RequestParam(value="specialty")
                                           java.lang.String specialtyName)
                              throws InvalidIdentifierException
        Sets the selected specialty for the current calculation.
        Parameters:
        session - the current session
        specialtyName - the selected specialty name
        Throws:
        InvalidIdentifierException - if the specialty name is invalid
